attributes.action: Support teenagers who are at risk of exclusion and those who have been excluded.
attributes.additional_details: Support the youth by mentoring, educating them in such a way, that they are able to turn their lives around and become positive role models for the younger generation.
attributes.background: Steer the youth away from gangs, drugs and crime.  Too many young lives are lost.   Schools need to be involved in educating young people rather than excluding pupils. Community engagement is key to this, communities are aware of what the youth in their area are doing.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like more help for teenagers who are at risk of exclusion and those who have been excluded, but are not sure what exactly you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233855
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235008
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228528
